I want to see the things Paiar made.\""},{"lineNumber":62732,"originalJapaneseLine":"　見てみたいんだ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I want to take a look!\""},{"lineNumber":62733,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まあ……パイアールの……お友達なのかしら……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well... are you Paiar’s... friend?\""},{"lineNumber":62734,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まあまあ、大変だわ。よかった……はい、どうぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh my, that's troublesome. Well then... here you go.\""},{"lineNumber":62735,"originalJapaneseLine":"小さな音がしたかと思うと、","translatedEnglishLine":"Just as a small sound was heard,"},{"lineNumber":62736,"originalJapaneseLine":"部屋の外で何か重い音が響き渡った。","translatedEnglishLine":"a heavy noise echoed from outside the room."},{"lineNumber":62737,"originalJapaneseLine":"「工場長さんの邪魔をしないであげてね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Don’t disturb the factory manager.\""},{"lineNumber":62738,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん！　ありがとー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Okay! Thanks!\""},{"lineNumber":62739,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へへー、ぶい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hehe, voom!\""},{"lineNumber":62740,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いともあっさり……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That was surprisingly simple...\""},{"lineNumber":62741,"originalJapaneseLine":"「物怖じしないというか、なんと言うか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I don’t know whether to say fearless or what...\""},{"lineNumber":62742,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どう？　ランス、どうだ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"How is it? Lanse, what do you think?\""},{"lineNumber":62743,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あー、偉い偉い」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, good good.\""},{"lineNumber":62744,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちょ、雑に頭撫でるなよー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, don’t pet my head so roughly!\""},{"lineNumber":62745,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よーし、先に進むぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright, let’s move forward!\""},{"lineNumber":62746,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん……？　なんだ、この部屋」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hm...? What’s this room?\""},{"lineNumber":62747,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスたちは奇妙な部屋に行き当たった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance and the others came across a strange room."},{"lineNumber":62748,"originalJapaneseLine":"大きな部屋がふたつに仕切られており、","translatedEnglishLine":"A large room was divided into two,"},{"lineNumber":62749,"originalJapaneseLine":"ひとつはランスたちが居る側で、","translatedEnglishLine":"One side was where Lance and company were,"},{"lineNumber":62750,"originalJapaneseLine":"コンピュータが稼働したままになっている。","translatedEnglishLine":"with computers still running."},{"lineNumber":62751,"originalJapaneseLine":"もうひとつは扉ひとつで繋がっている、","translatedEnglishLine":"The other was connected by a single door,"},{"lineNumber":62752,"originalJapaneseLine":"殺風景な部屋。","translatedEnglishLine":"a bleak, bare room."},{"lineNumber":62753,"originalJapaneseLine":"人間が乗れる程度の台が、ぽつんと置かれただけ。","translatedEnglishLine":"There was just a single platform, big enough for a person to stand on."},{"lineNumber":62754,"originalJapaneseLine":"そして、その台には、ガラスケースで閉じられた、","translatedEnglishLine":"And on that platform, enclosed in a glass case,"},{"lineNumber":62755,"originalJapaneseLine":"肉塊が安置されていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"a lump of flesh was placed."},{"lineNumber":62756,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うえっ……なんだありゃ、気持ち悪い……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh... what’s that, gross...\""},{"lineNumber":62757,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひいいいぃぃ……昔のパパイアさんの部屋を","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eeeeek... it reminds me of old Papaya-san’s room...\""},{"lineNumber":62758,"originalJapaneseLine":"　思い出しますだ……なんまんだぶ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I remember it... Namu Amida Buddha...\""},{"lineNumber":62759,"originalJapaneseLine":"「び、びくびく震えておるぞ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-you’re trembling all over...\""},{"lineNumber":62760,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前がか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You?\""},{"lineNumber":62761,"originalJapaneseLine":"「たわけ！　あの肉塊がじゃ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Fool! It’s that lump of flesh!\""},{"lineNumber":62762,"originalJapaneseLine":"　わ、妾がこの程度で驚くか！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Do you think I would be surprised by something like this!\""},{"lineNumber":62763,"originalJapaneseLine":"「近くで見てみるか……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Shall we take a closer look...?"},{"lineNumber":62764,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ん、開かないな、この扉」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmph, this door won’t open.\""},{"lineNumber":62765,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ホント……何これ。物凄く厳重になってる……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Really... what is this? It’s sealed incredibly tightly...\""},{"lineNumber":62766,"originalJapaneseLine":"「開けてみろ、シィル」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Open it, Shiru.\""},{"lineNumber":62767,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい。ひらけ、ごまーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes! Open sesame!\""},{"lineNumber":62768,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んっ……ごま、ごまーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hm... sesame, sesame---!\""},{"lineNumber":62769,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だ、ダメです、ランス様……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"N-no good, Lord Lance...\""},{"lineNumber":62770,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちっ、ならもういい。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Tch, fine then.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっ、真っ暗になった。えいえい。ぽちぽち」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, it got pitch dark. Hey hey. Click click."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………だめか。ちっ、もういい」
「さて、となると他に役に立ちそうなのは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well then, the other thing that might be useful is..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……こいつか……」
「ふふふふふふ……おいで、パイアール。
いい子、いい子ね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're a good boy, a good boy..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うーむ……ちょっとおかしい感じはするが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm... it feels a bit strange, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ねえねえお姉ちゃん！
この奥ってどう行ったらいいの？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How do I get further inside here?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あらあら、奥に御用なの？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh my, do you have business further inside?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うん！　パイアールが作った物、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah! I want to see the things Paiar made."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見てみたいんだ！」
「まあ……パイアールの……お友達なのかしら……
まあまあ、大変だわ。よかった……はい、どうぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh my, that's troublesome. Well then... here you go."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 小さな音がしたかと思うと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just as a small sound was heard,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 部屋の外で何か重い音が響き渡った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a heavy noise echoed from outside the room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「工場長さんの邪魔をしないであげてね」
「うん！　ありがとー！」
「へへー、ぶい！」
「いともあっさり……」
「物怖じしないというか、なんと言うか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don’t know whether to say fearless or what..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どう？　ランス、どうだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "How is it? Lanse, what do you think?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あー、偉い偉い」
「ちょ、雑に頭撫でるなよー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, don’t pet my head so roughly!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よーし、先に進むぞ！」
「ん……？　なんだ、この部屋」
ランスたちは奇妙な部屋に行き当たった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and the others came across a strange room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大きな部屋がふたつに仕切られており、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A large room was divided into two,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひとつはランスたちが居る側で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: One side was where Lance and company were,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コンピュータが稼働したままになっている。
もうひとつは扉ひとつで繋がっている、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The other was connected by a single door,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 殺風景な部屋。
人間が乗れる程度の台が、ぽつんと置かれただけ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There was just a single platform, big enough for a person to stand on.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして、その台には、ガラスケースで閉じられた、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And on that platform, enclosed in a glass case,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 肉塊が安置されていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a lump of flesh was placed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うえっ……なんだありゃ、気持ち悪い……」
「ひいいいぃぃ……昔のパパイアさんの部屋を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eeeeek... it reminds me of old Papaya-san’s room..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 思い出しますだ……なんまんだぶ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I remember it... Namu Amida Buddha..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「び、びくびく震えておるぞ……」
「お前がか？」
「たわけ！　あの肉塊がじゃ！
わ、妾がこの程度で驚くか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Do you think I would be surprised by something like this!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「近くで見てみるか……
ん、開かないな、この扉」
「ホント……何これ。物凄く厳重になってる……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Really... what is this? It’s sealed incredibly tightly..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「開けてみろ、シィル」
「はい。ひらけ、ごまーー！」
「んっ……ごま、ごまーーー！」
「だ、ダメです、ランス様……」
「ちっ、ならもういい。

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
